animate.frames: from {-webkit-transform:scale(0.5);;background: rgba(96, 203, 27,0.5);-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) inset, 0 0 3px rgba(220, 120, 200, 0.5);color: red; }25% {background: rgba(196, 203, 27,0.8);-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 155, 255, 0.5) inset, 0 0 8px rgba(120, 120, 200, 0.8);color: blue;}50% {background: rgba(196, 203, 127,1);-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(155, 255, 255, 0.3) inset, 0 0 3px rgba(220, 120, 100, 1);color: orange;}75% {background: rgba(196, 203, 27,0.8);-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 155, 255, 0.5) inset, 0 0 8px rgba(120, 120, 200, 0.8);color: black;}to {-webkit-transform:scale(1.1);;background: rgba(96, 203, 27,0.5);-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) inset, 0 0 3px rgba(220, 120, 200, 0.5);color: green;}
